title: Stocks to Watch: Market Update from Cresset's Jack Ablin
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin, deputy editor Ben Levisohn and Jack Ablin, chief investment officer at Cresset discuss the outlook for financial markets, dividend stocks, and gold, and how to invest for the long term.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
